lead_paragraph: As protesters bashed big money and Wall Street, the Democratic Party’s moneyed elite gathered in Philadelphia, undeterred and mostly unabashed.

byline.original: By NICHOLAS CONFESSORE and AMY CHOZICK

headline.print_headline: Top Donors Leave Sidelines,  Ready to Open Checkbooks
headline.main: After Lying Low, Deep-Pocketed Clinton Donors Return to the Fore

snippet: As protesters bashed big money and Wall Street, the Democratic Party’s moneyed elite gathered in Philadelphia, undeterred and mostly unabashed....
abstract: Wealthy donors return to fore at Philadelphia cocktail parties following close of Democratic National Convention and its searing debates over influence of Wall Street and elite; donors had remained out of view for much of primary season, but events surrounding convention reveal degree to which wealth and privilege still determine access to party's A-list of elected officials.
